values:
ok, so i havent done this in forever. i might write something rad again oneday...
-jasper
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/7908.html

this was a great weekend. for all of you that dont know, i turned 22 on friday. i went out with my good friends all weekend. and sunday brodie hosted the end. it was so much fun. i leave for japan in like 3 weeks... fuck yeah!
You are Form 9, Vampire: The Undying. "And The Vampire was all that remained on
the blood drowned creation. She attempted to
regrow life from the dead. But as she was
about to give the breath of life, she was
consumed in the flame of The Phoenix and the
cycle began again." Some examples of the Vampire Form are Hades (Greek)
and Isis (Egyptian). The Vampire is associated with the concept of
death, the number 9, and the element of fire. Her sign is the eclipsed moon. As a member of Form 9, you are a very realistic
individual. You may be a little idealistic,
but you are very grounded and down to earth.
You realize that not everything lasts, but you
savor every minute of the good times. While
you may sometimes find yourself lonely, you
have strong ties with people that will never be
broken. Vampires are the best friends to have
because they are sensible.

Which Mythological Form Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla i didnt even cheat! i cant wait to get my fangs
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/7537.html

im going to be on 107.7 the end on sunday night. im hosting with brodie. this should be fun. i hope john lets me pick some bands to play, you know i will play hodder, problem with heroes(the new stuff that NO ONE has heard because i recorded it) and some other locals that rule, like the blood brothers.

call up and give me shit. word
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/7422.html

http://www.atourhands.com

please look at this, and you might just understand why i dont eat animals. if you're weak hearted, or get sick easy, dont look. this is not an attempt to be preaching at all of you. if some of you want to know why i am this way...
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/6978.html

i get to go to japan! im going to be playing bass for a band called brodie on the mxpx tour. its kind of funny playing pop punk... haven't done it in forever.

the only shitty thing is that its the weekend before finals. so i have to study when im there, and i have a feeling that wont happen.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/6796.html

ok, so we only have two people left that we are going to try out for the band. if nothing happens i think im going to move to norway and sell smack... ok not really.

i miss these people: meag, betho, alex, and even jim. we need to hang out soon. 

still waiting for peeps to go with me to the slivertips games, once you go, you will know why hockey is so great!
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/6426.html
ok, so i went to my first hockey game EVER. its was the coolest. Everett Silver Tips OWN! i have seasons tickets... so maybe some of you can go with me :)
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/6228.html
i think i met the most amazing person ever. i really do.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/6107.html
so im cool because i got the new coheed and cambria... and its fucking amazing. oh, trying out like 10 singers in the next week... ah crazy shit.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/5642.html
this is what we all have become:
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/5628.html

i hate school. im not happy that im going again. i cant wait till we are done with the damn ep so we can start touring. alex is going to coem up and check the new songs out... i really think hes going to like them. i hope so because we just want to tour. 
i think im going to take a road trip to cali.. anyone interested?
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/5284.html

its so hard to part with someone you care a love so much. last night we kicked chris out of the band. i think that was the hardest thing ever. the worst part is when he came in, robert and jim did all the talking. i was completly frozen. i couldn't say anything. and chris walked out the door, jim and robert were pissed. i ran after chris and asked him to go on a walk with me... it was really fucking hard. he was everything we wanted in a singer, except his voice didn't fit.

god it sucked.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/5032.html

glamour robbi

wHicH RobBii r U ??
brought to you by Quizilla
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/4863.html

We are officially recording all this month. Its already getting me stressed out. We have to give the label a finished product but the end of this month. I'm excited because we are going to record all this new shit we wrote and I'm very proud of it. 
This only thing that really sucks is i haven't had time to hang out with my peeps. I'm sorry bethany :)
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/4416.html

AWK is the man. im going to quit killing chloe so i can start a party band and tour with him. im so happy that bethany took me last night. i had so much fun... and now johnny knoxville is my best friend. no joke. he was at the show and was like "dude, i think you are so much cooler than me! wanna be bestfriends" i think i woke up on bethanys couch after that. im going to get a pet tiger. that would be grand... i will steal a baby cub from a zoo, since zoos are the devil.

anyways, killing chloe is playin on saturday. i hope people go. the jet city fix rule. slayer does too.
-jasper
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/4103.html

Livejournal Mood Ring

death2jasper is emotionally distant.
I bet no one's surprised that you never post your current mood. In fact, I bet most of your friends are so sick of you locking them out of your life that they hate you behind your back. Shame.

brought to you by . wanna know your livejournal's mood ring color? enter your username and hit the button.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/3885.html

so hanging out with bethany has been sooooooo soooooo sooooo great. I can say that she's perfect in every way. I like going up to the B-Ham and hangin gout with her friends, they are all really cool. last night we went to this martini bar and met up with her friend and her friends parents. i got pretty drunk.. kinda funny drinkin foo foo drinks and getting wasted. 
anyways... i didn't want to leave but had to get home to work. i'm so happy i met someone that can make me this happy. and to add to that, she's taking me to AWK tonight in bc! now thats a perfect girl!
-jasper
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/3592.html
This weekend was great. 200 miles to see the crush, twice. It was fucking amazing.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/3430.html

I saw an old crush of mine on friendster. I messaged her and she got me on AIM... She confronted me about liking her and asked me to come up this weekend. I dont really know how to feel about this. But it sure does help with everything else. Maybe all girls aren't bad... hahaha
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/3114.html

I can't really explain how I feel. I'm sick of people. Sick of them making a judgement on me just because of my past. Sick of them being stupid and rude to me because they just cant admit that THEY fucked up. Dont say shit about me if you dont know me. 

I'm happy that my crew is real. We have been working so hard on the shit for our album. Its working out, since we just got signed :)
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/2857.html

why do i want what i can't have? why do i love who wont love back? i want to hate you but i can't. i know you are an amazing person and i wish we could share our lives together. what is it? what do i have to do to prove to you that all those mother fuckers are nothing compared to what i can be? ... what we could be. 
at the same time i just want to say fuck it all. i have the friends i need. 

...i think of what it looks like... 
...i think of what it tastes like... 
...strange same... said its strange because i feel the same.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/2800.html

I know who my real friends are. Doesn't take long to figure out who the fake ones are. 
In other news the band is doing really fucking good. We are going to start recording our EP in September. I cant wait! We are playing some great shows coming up too. Anatomy of a ghost, Jet City Fix, Fear Before The March of Flames and more. 

Fuck you
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/2444.html
I'm done with this shit. I have become better. I can't run with the blood on my hands. This is me felling reborn.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/2180.html
Ever just feel empty? Like the people the you care about the most are blowing you off? Thats me right now... not fun. This is about everyone in my life...
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/1976.html

Fuck, my friends are all crazy. Chris, Bethany, and Robert are staying the night tonight. Bob was invited but he's to fucking cool. Anyways the are reading a letter from this girl I dated for a little while. She started stalking me. When we showed up at the studio, I found a 10 page letter from her. Dude, girls fucking scare me. anyways...

I think my friends are on crack. Its like 2am and they fucking run around and slide on our new hardwood floor. I love them. 

Robert just tried jumping over the couch and fell on the floor... and spilt my soy milk... 

Ok, I"m tired.
Jasper
I miss Nichole so much. God damn.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/1584.html
I hate being stood up. Even worse when that person makes double plans. It just hurts.
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/1287.html

I took nichole to Reggie and the full effect tonight for her b-day. It was by far the best show I have ever been to. It was so fun and Alex and I talked a lot. I really like that guy. It was fun talking to alex because him and I are in the same situation... god that kid rocks.


Recording is going fab style. I can't wait till we finish this shit and get it up on mp3.com

rock out with you fox out
Jasper
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/1097.html

Well, its 6:50am on Friday. I haven't gone to sleep yet. We recording all night, and I started getting fuckin burnt. Casper had Beth come to the studio, and that kinda woke me up. She's fucking cool. I really wish them the best. Than Nichole texted me and said she missed me... it made me feel really good. She then told me she wanted to hang out... So Beth went and picked her up in seattle.. long fucking story that no one cares about. I'm just glad nic and beth are getting a long. It was good to see her play drums again. She getting so good, and she looks so damn hot when shes playing too... Jasper, Beth, Nic and I are going to the Gatsby show and gonna kick it after. Should be a blast.

Its nice to sleep next to someone that mean so much to you.. especially after giving them a 30min back rub, and they pass out.. haha. Worth every min

Life its a fuckin crazy thing
-Jasper
http://death2jasper.livejournal.com/772.html

i'm starting to like what its looking like. well, i'm off to work on our recording for alex. too bad he hates me... hahahahahaha

word - jasper

this is the first time i have ever done this. 

I hope all of you can help me figure this shit out... I'm dumb.
